name: Chinese Chess-Wargame
description:
Add war chess elements to the Chinese chess game "Chinese Chess." It retains the original basic rules while adding war chess elements, making the chess pieces more flexible and allowing for more variations. If you are familiar with "Chinese Chess," then you should be able to pick it up quickly, find opponents online, and challenge them to become a new master.

Join our Discord!

More versatile chess pieces

More flexible tactics

Execute more complex maneuvers



If your rank reaches "Master" or above and you are in the top three of the leaderboard, you will receive a special title.
